meanings.definition: Emitting or giving off an odor or smell.
meanings.sent1: The effluvial flowers filled the room with a sweet fragrance.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was effluvial with the scent of freshly baked bread.
meanings.sent3: The effluvial perfume made everyone sneeze uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The effluvial aroma of coffee lingered in the air long after it was brewed.
meanings.sent5: The effluvial smell of the garbage truck was unmistakable.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to waste or sewage.
meanings.sent1: The effluvial pipes needed urgent repair to prevent leaks.
meanings.sent2: The effluvial treatment plant processed the sewage efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The effluvial river carried waste downstream, polluting the environment.
meanings.sent4: The effluvial disposal site was causing harm to the surrounding area.
meanings.sent5: The effluvial smell from the sewer was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: The effluvial from the garbage dump made me hold my breath.
meanings.sent2: The effluvial from the swamp was unbearable on hot days.
meanings.sent3: The effluvial from the skunk was so strong it could be smelled from miles away.
meanings.sent4: The effluvial of decay filled the abandoned house.
meanings.sent5: The effluvial of rotten eggs made everyone gag.
